text: Jack Andrew Garry Wilshere (born 1 January 1992) is an English football coach and former professional player who played as a midfielder. He is the head coach of the Arsenal under-18 team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Europe Other Total
